sentences.english: What makes my brother think he's so smart?
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥凭什么认为自己是那么聪明？

sentences.english: Payment will be made by irrevocable Letter of Credit against presentation of documents to the issuing bank.
sentences.chinese: 付款方式为凭单据以不可撤消的信用证向发卡行议付。

sentences.english: I even didn't know where it is.
sentences.chinese: 我就莫了个名了，你凭什么认为是我吃的啊？

sentences.english: The audio book with a live goose, Donglai not far from Penglai.
sentences.chinese: 好把音书凭过雁，东莱不似蓬莱远。

sentences.english: Just based only on the food here.
He wanted to win the horse No. 12 by straining his luck.
sentences.chinese: 他想凭他运气把赌注押在了12号马上。

sentences.english: I that speak in righteousness, mighty to save.
sentences.chinese: 就是我，是凭公义说话，以大能施行拯救。

sentences.english: Self-Serve Debit And Credit Card Only.
The token entitle you to two free admission to the museum.
sentences.chinese: 凭此券你可以得到两张参观博物馆的免费入场券。

sentences.english: We must not act on assumptions.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能凭想当然办事。

sentences.english: He wouldn't drone when he may live by honest labour.
sentences.chinese: 他可凭诚实的劳动生活时，他不愿游手好闲。

sentences.english: The existence of "The Expectant Duty Behavior" has its objective, realistic social foundation.
sentences.chinese: 这两种人都凭主观，忽视客观实际事物的存在。

sentences.english: With personal business card or related proofs to achieve free passport.
sentences.chinese: 凭个人名片或相关职业证明获取免费入场证。

sentences.english: Could he find it by scent?
The good seaman is known in bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 要识好海员，须凭坏天气。

sentences.english: This ticket entitles you to get a free French fries in the KFC.
sentences.chinese: 凭此券你可以在肯德基免费得到一份炸薯条。
